actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Mogollon Mesa project, Arizona.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Mogollon Mesa project to furnish water to the community of Flagstaff, Arizona. Authorizes to be appropriated $77,000,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Mogollon Mesa project, Arizona.
